findings.suggestion: Add 'About' section with relevant content for your organization

findings.message: Section 'About' expected for small charity (£45,062 income)
findings.suggestion: Add 'About' section - organizations of your size typically include this

findings.suggestion: Add 'Contact' section - organizations of your size typically include this

findings.message: Website appears to be missing About page(s)
findings.suggestion: Add About page(s) to your website to improve llms.txt completeness

findings.message: Website appears to be missing Services page(s)
findings.suggestion: Add Services page(s) to your website to improve llms.txt completeness
Add a sitemap.xml to help with content discovery

findings.message: Repetitive and unhelpful link descriptions - all links use 'Where our stories live' regardless of their actual purpose - AI systems cannot understand what each link provides, making it impossible to direct users to appropriate resources
findings.suggestion: Replace generic descriptions with specific ones like 'Apply for support services', 'Make a donation', 'View impact reports', etc.

findings.message: Multiple duplicate links with slight variations (#content anchors) creating confusion - Redundant information makes it harder for AI to determine the canonical resource and may confuse routing decisions
findings.suggestion: Consolidate duplicate links and keep only the primary URL for each unique resource

findings.message: Same repetitive 'Where our stories live' descriptions used for involvement/donation links - AI cannot distinguish between different ways to get involved or support the organization
findings.suggestion: Use descriptive text like 'Volunteer opportunities', 'Donation options', 'Ways to support our work'

findings.message: Blog and privacy policy links use the same generic description - AI systems cannot differentiate between organizational content and legal documents
findings.suggestion: Use 'Latest news and stories from our community' for blog and 'Data protection and privacy information' for policy

findings.message: Section title 'Get Help' is misleading as it includes donation and administrative links rather than just support services - AI may incorrectly categorize donation pages as support services, confusing users seeking help
findings.suggestion: Rename to 'Resources' or separate into 'Get Support' and 'Other Resources' sections

findings.message: Impact metrics lack specific numbers or timeframes - AI cannot provide concrete information about the organization's effectiveness or scale of operations
findings.suggestion: Add quantitative data where possible, e.g., 'X% of members receiving positive decisions in 2023'

suggested_pages: Add a sitemap.xml file to help with content discovery

recommendations: Fix 3 critical issue(s): Get Help, Get Involved, About
Improve content quality in: Optional, Get Help
Website improvements: Create a dedicated /services or /what-we-do page
